site_name: 2-6 Commercial Street, 98-105 Whitechapel High and Canon Barnett Primary School
description: Request for an Environmental Impact Assessment Scoping Opinion under Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017 for a commercial development comprising up to 50,000 sqm GEA (gross external area) of office (Class B1), retail (Class A1-A5), non-residential institution (Class D1) and servicing space of approximately 38,250 sqm NIA (net internal area). The proposed development area will be across 19 storeys and two basement levels. The application includes demolition of some buildings currently on the site with the intention to retain sections of the existing building facades along Whitechapel High Street and Commercial Street, relocation of the adjacent school playground, and construction of new school amenities.
